content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my porch looking at the stars and watching the planes moving in the sky when i noticed a bright white sphere moving in the sky from the ne and eventually veering to the north. the spheres where bright white and had no blinking lights. it was very high in the sky and above the normal airline traffic. it was too big to be a satellite and wasnt high enough to even be considered a satellite. the speed was 5x faster then the air traffic that i was observing.

i immediately contacted an associate that lives on the other side of the city. he confirmed seeing the white sphere but had seen two of them moving in the same direction. i had limited visiblity of the sky due to tree obstructions and had not seen the second one.
content.summary: Two white spheres moving at high speed.

content.detailedDescription: 3 eye wittnesses saw a large orb moving over house from south to north.  the object made no sound. video was taken of the object.
content.summary: Large orb moving rapid over house.

content.detailedDescription:
I have photos and vhs tapes of:
orbs
ligt balls/streaks
mist
ectoplasm
flying "fairys"
how i looked after an attack by unknown entities
ufos 
lights / orbs flying around the room where i sleep and many other areas also
 
diarys and log of a 2 month ufo sighting
aliens
ghosts
demons

as far as i can remember, this sort of paranormal activity first became noticable with me in 1992, washington state.
it was ongoing.
it calmed down in approx.2004 and i thought i was free from 'them'.
i moved to ocean shores, wa. in 2008 and slowly became aware that "they "
had slipped back into my life again.
(*residence info deleted--sgonzalez/cms).
i live in an old building that used to be bo-jos deli and bait shop.
the owners died and the upstairs was remodled into 2 apt. units.  i live in apt.A on the 2nd floor.  my walls are almost all windows with the ocean to the north, the canal to the south, and the bay to the west of me, so i have a great view.  it is secluded.
as of june 1, 2010 i spoted a ufo.  since then i have seen them about 10-15 times this month.  
i also have some sort of entity that stares through my skylights  nightly.
also ghosts, demon faces, mist, silver rain, orbs,ectoplasm, pictures that form on my windows etc.
it has been a month from hell for me.
i have written my experiences down and have vcr tapes and photos of most everything that is happening here.
it is all too much to write down here now.
i wish someone would come and see what i have photographed and taped and read my story i wrote.
i have no transportation right now so i am stuck here alone.  i have a defective pelvis and can't walk far or i would walk right out of here.  it's getting too creepy for me alone.
you could no doubt come here in the evening and see some of this activity if you wish.
content.summary: Ongoing ufo activty occurring since june 1, 2010 to now.

content.detailedDescription: At 9:45, i walked out to the front deck to smoke a cigarette. to my right, a bright object caught my attention. i look to the west and see a flying object, moving east north east at a fast pace steady speed. then i hear the sound of a jet engine at full thrust. i look left and east of the object and see a passenger or cargo jet flying from the north to the south, south east, moving east to avoid this craft, i could not tell if the jet was moving up or down but it was trying to miss the object. i could see the red and green lights on each wing tip and the strobe lights of the jet. at that time i jumped back, grabbed the front door knob went inside and picked up the bushnell glasses, and rush back outside. i rest the field glasses against the vertical post on the deck. now i see the unidentified object with much better vision. i can see clear a black air frame around the bright welding ark light, buy this time the craft is moving away to the east still looking at the craft i see the blackness surrounding it. someone please tell me what i saw someone flying a jet dodged it i was not halusinating. i called anderson county regional airport to report the guy said he heard nothing. was it the space station the space shuttle. why did i see a jet try to dodge a space station or military craft. why did it not have strobe lights why did it keep its course and a jet deviate from it's course to avoid someone has to know. this event took place in hartwell g.A. not far from hartwell dam on lake hartwell the craft was moving in the directon of anderson airport.
content.summary: Light bright as a welding ark 8 to 10 thou, altitude, west to east maybe 400 mph.

content.detailedDescription: I was in itikent urla dining with my friend on their terrace.I first noticed a deep blue light in the sky and thought it might be from an airplane. then me and my friends (6 people all together) saw that it was rather a fleet of strange blue lights, some bright some not so bright maybe a hundred of them or more traveling south bound over itokent urla. they were moving unhurriedly but quite fast for an object of such altitude. they had the bouyoncy of balloons. but some of them had very sharp blue lights shining. they traveled southbound and disappeared unhurriedly. the blue light parade lasted about 5 minutes before it disappeared.
content.summary: A fleet of blue lights flickering and moving south in a sort of disorderly manner.

content.detailedDescription:
At roughly 10 pm i was lying in bed in my bedroom which has full length glass windows which looks west. suddenly i saw a fast moving blue flash that was like a large flare that fell out of the sky and disappeared behind an apt bldg several blocks away. i thought a helicopter dropped out of the sky and i rushed to turn the tv on to see breaking news. it was very bright blue and left a white tail like light behind it as it fell. it was probably 1 or 2 seconds when it disappeared behind the bldg. it was almost like a falling star or a firework that fizzled and fell back to the ground. there was no sign of anything in the sky directly after the initial event.

i called my husband to look but nothing else happened. it was not a lighting bolt, it had an arch curve to the fall and was more like a falling star.
content.summary: Falling bright blue flashing teardrop-shaped object.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was driving home from dmv 
2. i noticed this object because i'm always looking up in the skies ( quickly when i drive)
3. at first glance i thought it was a silver ballon.
4. it moved west to east at a slow pace about 100ft from ground. then it drifted upward and parked under a large cloud and and stayed there. i had to leave becuse the sun started hurting my eyes.
content.summary: Floated like a balloon.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside facing north when i saw small ball of red light ascend and than descend and disappear. this happened several times. then i saw what looked like a bright gold stream of light go up and then it showed a bright gold head in the air. i saw these bright gold lights last weekend and thought they were shooting stars or meteor showers.
content.summary: Strange light that looks like a meteor and red balls of light.

content.detailedDescription:
At 23:16, i had just checked the time on my cell phone when, looking at an airplane circling in the general area of the olympia airport, i noticed a bright venus-sized object appearing out of the west, having just passed some cloud cover. it steadily transversed the sky, remaining an unchanging blob of light until it vanished to the west past the top of the hill where cleveland avenue runs. according to my cell phone, which runs on at&t time and always seems a minute or two behind everyone else the sighting ended at 23:20. 

checked w/heavens-above.Com. according to the site, there was an iridium flare at 22:50 and another at 23:38, so that would seem to ruled those out as an explanation. when i got home about 12:40 am, the iss was over the pacific ocean roughly around hawaii, so that would seem to rule out that as an explanation. 

sunset was at 21:12. i understand the window for seeing satellites is about 45 to 90 minutes after the sun has gone down so that would place the time of my sighting a little more than a half hour outside that window as well.
content.summary: Venus-sized object at wrong time to be satellite, iss or iridium flare

content.detailedDescription:
I was out in my yard sitting on the patio. i was enjoying the evening. i live near midway airport and could not help watching all the airline traffic going by as i watched the stars. that night there was an odd white light cutting through the tree line and landed just above the garage roof next door which is next to our yard. i dont know what the source of this light was but i have never seem  white light basically in our yard like this. a vertical white line cutting through the trees and ending. it may be nothing  but i am including it because the other lights that appeared in a very spectacular way were seen right in this lights line.

as i was sitting - i observed red balls of light coming from the west in a low and straight line. the balls of light (several) every couple minutes maybe 5 to ten minutes came in as a single ball of red light. there was no noise and no faa navigation lights. the balls of light were pinkred and seemed to be glowing internally and not throwing off a light. these lights when they got to certain point started moving upward and then they started descending back down behind the tree line. these lights also got smaller to disappearing for a second or so - to then getting bigger. i watched this for a couple of times and minutes.

after a couple of times of watching this and the pattern of these lights coming in and ascending and descending. i saw the lights going behind the tree but after that i could not see what or where they went. about a minute or two later i see this very bright light in the tree very low to the ground by the neighbor across the street to the north in front of me. at first i assumed it must of been the darn kids or a big truck with led headlights. but since this house is across from my yard - again -i have never even seen a car headlight or any other light coming from there. this light just got brighter and slowly moved up inside this tree. as it moved up it got bigger. when it got to the top of the tree all i could see was a huge white glare of light. it just hovered and then it turned itself on to what looked like a giant headlight from a old car with some sort of chrome surrounding it. it got scared and was ready to pee in my pants when this object started coming right towards me while i was sitting on the patio chair. i was in awe when this light came right over my head to the top of the evergreen tree next to me which is just above the roof of line the house. as this light came over it also turned on what looked like someone slapped a 2x4 on each side of this light in a v. on each side of this huge headlight on this v were lights of green maybe 8 in a row. the same on the other side but the lights were red. the lights once they turned on never blinked they were stationary. as it came above me i saw a body to this object it was a pale pearly green. there were no lights on the end or side of this object.

after - this event i sat there in shock. as i was about to get up and go check out the area i see in front of me facing north in my yard just above the utility lines a object or light that was shaped in a triangle made up of not a solid object but small triangle objects that formed this. it appeared out of nowhere and it was like it materialized right in front of me. at this time this white light i had mentioned in the trees was still there and this object was lined right up to the tip of this light. when it got to the tip of the light i lit up like a purple silver color. it went into the tree where the light was coming. again - no noise, no other lights . nothing.

after a while after this - maybe 1/2 hour or so - the red balls of light started up again. doing the exact same thing. this time someone came home and witnessed these balls of light too. went back in around 11:30pm.
content.summary: Strange light events that defy explanation.

content.detailedDescription:
I was heading north on hy99 just south of lodi, ca. when i noticed what i first thought was an airliner traveling west to east directly in front of me. what caught my attention was it had no vapor trail. i watched as it moved behind a high thin cloud (partially cloudy sky with mostly thin wispy clouds) and it stopped moving forward.  this really stirred my curiosity so i continued watching it. the cloud moved from in front of it it stood still for at least 30 sec. and then it began climbing at a right angle to its previous direction (up and to the west). the object moved slower than an airliner and slowly got smaller until i could no longer see it. later that day i observed an airliner in about the same area of the sky and observed that it did leave a vapor trail and was traveling just above the clouds at about the same alttitude as  the object. what really struck me was the difference in size of the airliner and the object i had seen earlier.  i would have to estimate the size of the unknown object as at least 10 times the size of a commercial airliner. while watching the airliner i observed that as it moved away from me it appeared to move in a downward direction due to the curvature of the earth whereas the unidentified object moved up and to the left (west) as it grew smaller confirming that it was gaining altitude as if faded away.
the object was metallic in appearance and was possible cigar shaped, as it changed direction i didn���t see any wings like you would see on a banking airline.The full impact of what i saw didn���t really register until i observed the jetliner later that day and confirmed that what i saw didn���t resemble it in either size or behavior.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright metalic object possible cigar or cylinder shaped.

content.detailedDescription: I was in the fire escape and i was looking in the sky (like i always do )and i saw some thing moving very slow and i thought it was a plane but it was not moving so i thought it waz a helicopter but it was not so i got my phone and got a pic of it
content.summary: Very shiny and moving very slow no lights on it

content.detailedDescription:
In the last 7 days over the skies of hwy 92,near my house there is very bright yellow light that comes and stops about 6000 to 8000 feet high,this object dances and fly at incredible speed ,first i noticed early in the morning walking my dogs ,it comes from west to east, and then back east to west... , and now comes from others directions , but always stops at almost the same place and look like is watching from the sky, and start to drop and gain altitude and then flies away and disappear living no sight at all at speed hard to believe that is man made, and worst ...Stays and stops in the air  for so long... ,now is appearing late at night about 10 pm, in a different direction but visible from my neighborhood, every one that i show the event neighbors etc...They feel very weird saying they never see anything like that before.
i do fly a lot, and i know the difference between airplane,satellites,helicopters,comets etc..
this one , is not!
if you guys know anything about it , please let me know, and i will try to record the event and show later at the site,thanks for the help and support.
content.summary: A bright light star-like that moves like no other that i ever see it.

content.detailedDescription: Between the hours of 10 and 11:30 pm for the past two nights, i have been watching what can only be described as glowing white orbs. i have seen these on other occasions as well, however, these past two nights have been different. other times these objects were at a very high altitude. on the evening of the 23rd i saw one that was at a much lower altitude. it was traveling w to e. no sound whatsoever as it passed over. no erratic movements. seems to travel a fairly straight line. even though it was lower than the others, it was still higher than commercial jets in flight. went on mufon website yesterday to see if anyone else reported similar objects. someone from nj reported a star like object at a low astitude. i am sure we probably saw the same thing. i live 10 mins. drive from the delaware water gap. i don't know where in nj this was witnessed. at any rate, on the 23rd i saw at least 4 of these. 1 low, the other 3 very highe up. last night, the 24th, i witnessed at least 12 of these strange floating orbs of light. once again, there was  1 that was much lower. this time it was traveling n to s. as far as speed is concerned, i would say they travel at least as fast as jets. yesterday morning a huge helicopter went over my property. it followed the exact path of the lower orb. interesting. last night while observing these objects a small plane came by very low and moving very slowly. got the eerie feeling that this is all connected. i should add that some of these orbs can only be seen with binoculars. others can be seen with the naked eye. if i didn't look up with binoculars, i wouldn't ever know they were there. if not for fatigue and a very sore neck causing me to finally go indoors, i feel i could probably watch these things all night. these orbs are silent, and definitely not anything conventional or familiar. i've been a sky watcher for most of my 49 years and have seen other ufos. none like the ones i've been seeing for the past couple of months. i simply don't know what they are. but, i do know what they aren't. doubtful that i'm seeing 12 satillites in a period of an hour and a half! sorry for the typos, but, i'm trying to get this reported while it is fresh in my mind, and before the business of everyday life distracts me as it should. it's easy to become obsessed with this when youv'e seen some of the things i've seen all my life, but in particular the last 10 years. i am already in contact with one of your investigators about my sightings. felt the need to report the events of the last two nights on line for all who are seeing strange things in our night skies. for those who say, "why don't the ufos just show themselves to everyone!". they are. you just have to look. from my mountainside view........Icu2!.
content.summary: Observed glowing orbs for past 2 nights.

content.detailedDescription:
Standing by the window for a min or two , than my eyes went to the eastern direction & at that moment i saw , out of a thin air , a white light ball manifested itself traveling in a straight line at great speed from east to west direction (their usual flight pattern) above the lake & than once in the west it just disappeared without any flush . seemed they were in big hurry this time . to the question #2 & #5 , i was expecting to see them as i had no reason to go to look out the window & actually was about to leave home , i always feel happy to see them . 
someone wrote a report re: a dream of the ets , don't worry , that is one way how they communicate , good that you have a clear mind & heart . and yes they do at times have some difficulty manouver the ships in our atmosphere . a year ago i too had a simmilar dream & in it they travelled in front of my building towards eastern direction & about an hour later after awaking it was in the news ufo crashed in the ottawa river.
content.summary: White light ball travelled at great speed.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the bank of the susquehanna river with my friend. we had started going for a walk around 9:30 and reached the river at around 10:30, so the times on this are an estimate. the first place on the bank where we stopped, we laid on a paved area to rest after walking for so long, and watched the sky. through the trees, i saw what looked like a white fireball. it was a very tight sphere with a long tail. i have no idea how far away it was, but from where i was lying it looked about as big as a pea in the sky. it was very pretty, and seemed to travel in a straight line before disappearing or burning out. we both saw it. we both seemed to almost want to suggest it was a shooting star, but we knew it was too bright, and it had an uncharacteristic red tail, so my friend guessed it was some sort of debris. still, it was burning pretty brightly and had a distinct sphere shape, so that may not be the case. the most striking thing about it was the tail. we were both pretty impressed by it.

later we went swimming, and i saw what looked to be a rather white star descending quickly towards the horizon. again, it moved in a straight line but it was a pretty small speck this time and had no tail. my friend didn't see it. i made a joke, something along the lines of "there goes buddy holly," since it reminded me of the description his manager gave of the lights of his plane disappearing as it fell, but it was only a single light, not like the formation of lights produced by a plane. 

i've also seen strange electric-looking activity over the river a few months ago, but that may have just been an electrical storm, and i don't remember the event well enough to give an accurate account of it. anyways, the sky over the susquehanna river is beautiful, and i'll probably be out there skygazing a lot over the summer. my only response to these events is interest, they don't give me a bad or threatening feeling at all.
content.summary: Strange bright sphere with a reddish tail, later fast moving star.

content.detailedDescription: Looked up in the sky and seen what looked like a constant changing orb of light moving from east to west. there was no steady color. it was constantly changing. looked like it was going to crash. it was shooting sparks (the sparks were changing colors also) and had what seemed to be a "searchlight" looking around it. it moved erratically before stopping and disappearing into the sky. it returned a couple minutes later only to disappear after another 15 or 20 seconds. promptly after that, military aircrafts could be seen surveying the skys. they are still out there and its been over 2 hours.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Circle,   Fireball,   Flash,   Saturn-like,   Sphere,   Star-like
content.summary: Round and flashing.

content.detailedDescription:
Large ufo fireball star, flying low north east towards kansas city, at approx 10:15 pm  totally silent.  i could believe how large or how low it was flying.  shorting after a small ufo that looked like a star, flew by north towards kansas city. 
i was outside only about 10 minutes enjoying the full moon and the stars on my balcony, when i saw this ufo.  i called my husband, who happen to be at the lower level of my home on the phone.  i could hardly get the words out for him to hurry up and come-outside.  he just missed it as it flew over the tree tops.  i had seen another ufo large star like on june 19th, and spotted other ufos in this area, though this one on the 19th was not as large as the one tonight.  my whole family have witness these shooting star like  ufos for months, in my area.  they are usually small and the same size as the stars.  they mostly appear on a clear night. for the most part they are no big deal to me, because, i have seen many of these small ufos...But tonight, this large ufo fireball star, that i saw was something totally unexpected!
content.summary: Large ufo fireball star.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in crawfordsville, indiana looking up at the stars (at the north star) when i saw a bright white light appear just below the north star.  at first i thought it was a planet that i didn't notice before but it was far too bright and began moving north before fading away about thirty seconds later.  then about half a minute later i saw the same bright light appear from the west traveling very fast toward the east taking about 45 seconds to accomplish it's trip.

the whole experience from beginning to end had my heart racing. i am an astronomer and often watch the stars and track satellites but both of these objects were far brighter than the iss or any satellite i have ever seen and moved about as fast as a military jet.  with both of these objects appearing in the exact same fashion at the same time leaves me suspicious that they could have been satellites or anything i am familiar with.
content.summary: Two bright lights in the sky - one going north and the other going west to east.

content.detailedDescription:
My partner and i were hanging out at the beach, just listening to the water of lake erie and enjoying watching the moon and stars through binoculars.  we were on our way off the beach to come home, and i kept watching the sky - when i noticed something hovering above one of the brightest stars - and flashing.  i pulled out the binoculars again to see that it was a black triangle with three lights - one on each corner (i believe the lights were red, green, and white).  it just sat in the air for about a minute and a bit more and then disappeared into thin air.

looking at it, i felt slightly nervous so i wasn't quite sure it was benevolent.  (to explain, almost a year ago, i saw six light orbs and a single ufo that made me feel so happy to see.  i immediately felt whomever was in there was kind and loving, and i also just felt "arcturians", though i'd really had no prior experience/contact with arcturians at that time.)  i reckoned it was military, as i've heard many times black triangles are actually our crafts.

i unfortunately didn't catch a photo of it - it was too far away, and we don't have the world's best camera.  but i did see it through binoculars, and i can be quite a debunker, but there's no debunking what i saw in this one.  definitely not an everyday thing.
content.summary: Black triangle.

content.detailedDescription:
I happened to glance outside and noted how grey the skies were tonight. we had an intense rainstorm in the general (golf sized hailstones out in long island, trees torn up and an unusual amount of heat & humidity before the rain hit). i notice an odd light in the skies. at first i thought it was a plane but it was stationary. i then assumed it was a helicopter but something was nagging. i got my binoculars and took a peek. it was definitely not a plane because jets were passing by all night (i'm 30 min from la guardia) and this object was just hovering in place. on the left side i saw the tip was blue while the rest was an off-white/yellowish shade. then colors changed to white and began to flicker in an odd pattern. after a few minutes i noticed a definite pattern.

three short flashes
three long flashes
three long flashes
a long flash and a short dash

unnerved, i called over my mother who has better eyesight, 20/20 in fact to view. after a few moments she gasped and gave me the binoculars. the object stopped flashing its pattern and return to its whitish-yellowish color with blue on its left side. it then got brighter then it abruptly blinked out.

i just spent an hour scouring the web for any astronomical reports of predicted sightings to no avail.

1 - i was in the living room watching tv
2 - i happened to glance outside to stare at my now-vacant apartment that belonged to my godparents (one died and the other moved back to cuba). i looked to the sky
3 - a star but the clouds were too cloudy. then i thought it was an airplane but it wasn't moving. then i thought it was a helicopter but it was too far and too high to be a copter

4 - it simply hovered. it was vaguely teardrop with a slight bump in the middle like saturn or a typical looking saucer with a dome. the colors were blue on the left and yellowish-white the rest. it then to flicker in an odd pattern

5- for some reason after the flashing pattern i started feeling anxious, nervous, restless and for some reason very worried

6 - it just blinked out
content.summary: Bizarre unnerving light.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside of my house on my deck with two of my friends. out of the corner of my eye i noticed something moving across the sky and assumed it was a shooting star.  after looking at it directly i realized it was an extremely bright blue circle, and much much bigger than a shooting star would have been.  it moved straight across the sky at a steady pace moving faster than an airplane at the same altitude would've been.  it's hard describe the size since it was up so high, but from that distance it was about the size of a soccer ball.  up close it would obviously be much bigger.  right when i saw it i knew it was something unusual and started shouting for the other two to look.  by the time they turned around it was gone because the opening in the trees that i saw it through isn't very big.  it was behind the trees and gone by the time they looked.
content.summary: Very bright blue circular light

content.detailedDescription: Transparent disc (lens) moving exteremly fast. saw it and then gone in 3 seconds.  heard sound,  f-16/18 following on it's tail.
content.summary: Transparent.

content.detailedDescription: I was at my summer villa outside the suburb of karaj which is 45km outside of tehranwatching a movie in the garden on my laptop when i saw seven bright objects 3 on one side 4 on the other one flew right over me at a very low altitude and joined the others as the last one of 7 like an upside down v ascendinginto orbit, very surreal it made a very low pitch noise as it flew over head i wouldve expected it to be louder the accelaration was unbelieveble once it started going upwards it was circular in shape generally with no engines that i could see its initial altitude was around 40meters and my villa is around 60-65km outside the capitol and is not densly populated
content.summary: 7 bright objects ascending upwards into one formation at enormous speed.

content.detailedDescription: Nine people at a beach house near the carolina yacht club in wrightsville beach, nc saw a ball of reddish orange light blinking erratically, silently in the distance over the ocean. a small white light appeared out of nowhere, close to the object, then they disappeared.  then about 2 minutes later, it reappeared and we saw it divide instantaneously into nine orbs, assembled into a horizontal v formation, after which it disappeared in a couple of seconds. there was no sound and no other aircraft around, and it was about 10 degrees over the ocean's horizon, about 1 to 2 miles away. we were all shocked and we all agreed that what we saw was not manmade. the movement was too fluid, and the speed at which it divided was extremely fast and yet controlled. the sighting was at 9:35pm, and then at 9:37pm. shortly afterwards, we saw helicopters descending on the area over the ocean where we witnessed it. at around 11:45pm, two fighter jets flew by, parallel to the coast. why were they flying so close to a residential beach town at that time of night? the next day, military helicopters flew up and down the beach all day long, nonstop.
content.summary: Reddish orb dividing into nine distinct orbs in horizontal "v" formation over ocean.

content.detailedDescription: This is first time i had the guts to tell my story. i was in the united states air force, stationed at williams afb, chandler arizonia. the years was either 1972 or 1973 maybe october its been a long time. this incident was in the airizona republic news paper at that time.                                                                           i worked in base operations at williams afb was on duty that night  i filed flight plans for pilots who where in pilot training.No flying that night, gca (ground approch control) called me on hot line to tell me that there was something unusual on his gca scope 10 miles southwest of williams afb , he was picking up some sort of object which was being painted on his scope. so the ops officer and i checked with all agencys such as artc sectors working area around williams afb. they said no traffic flying in my area. then i called flight service station at sky harbor airport, they said nothing flying in our area too. it was very intersting that no agencys where picking up on radar except our gca unit. the ops officer and i went out to the gca unit ourselfs to see in on the gca scope.When we got to gca unit out on the field we could see this sphere round in shape glowing yellow/white color 10 miles to the southwest of williams afb. it was floating just obove the horizon in line of sight. then went into gca unit and observed it on the gca scope. at 10 miles it just glowed on the target being painted by the scope when the scope was on the back side of scope or dark side of scope, there was so much energy coming form object it would light up the bca scoup every time it pulsated its energy. true fact the gca officer on duty that night saw it ops officer saw it and i saw it. went back to base ops and command post called me to ask what was up i explained to them what was happing the commmand post was getting civilian calls wanting to know about see this object. inturn said to the public don't know. i guess the commanding  officer of williams afb told command post to tell us not speak to media or outside sources or we would be court martialed. faa flight service station called me back on the landline and told me that a few of the guys went to the top of faa building roof and could see this sphere 40 miles to southeast of there position like a spere glowing like the sun came out. the also said the watched it from a stand still where it was hovering move to the west and disapear over the mountains in about four or five seconds flat like a white strik going acorss the sky and disapearing across the west mountains which from its position was about 90 to 100 miles across that was moving fast to go that far and disapera in four to five seconds. end of my story.
content.summary: Round sphere shape /glowing like sun came out/pulsating energy.

content.detailedDescription:
Living in granbury, i always took the route to dallas that took me thru (near) cleburn, sort of a winding road that skits the so. edge of the "hill" country, (rocky hummocks & small hills) to the north, & relatively flat farming to the south. the rocky hills to my left were perhaps 150-200' in elevation. 
      late for a date in dallas, i was traveling about 75-80 mph when i noticed a glowing orb about the size of a soccer ball, liesurely 'bounceing' down a ravine towards the road.(about 200yds from it). each bounce took it about 15 or twenty feet into the air, landing about 75' from the previous touchdown point. this course put it approx. 2-3 sec. away from collision w/my truck, & i remember thinking 'im going to nail that sucker". too late to alter course i thought 'there's something wrong here". at that time, plastic &glass 'gazer' garden balls were popular & those were my first thought in re: to 'nailing' it. it was a steady, glowing orb,white to reddish @the center & red to yellow @ the outer edge. it's last mortal bounce came just towards the center of my underframe, and it seemed to strike the a frame. the collision sound was that of a few breaking wine glasses. i immediately stopped @ backed up to the point of impact, got out & started looking for pieces. and i.Looked for 35 minutes, 2-300' either way, under the hood, all in the a-frames, entire under-structure, & nothing, no piece,shards, slivers, nothing.
     to get to my moment of indesision, it bounced much like a helium balling, low on gas, would. #1. helium wouldn't lift one of those plastic or glass balls, @ the glass variety certainly wouldn't have survived the rocky terrain, but the why the ' tinkle,tinkle' sound on impact? being mid summer i could attribute the glowing as sun reflection from my back, but it glowed much more strongly than what you'd expect from a reflection. if it was man made material,  where did the pieces go?
     i've talked to a few (very few) people since, including a physisist, a none could offer anything other than ball lightning.  (ok, but why the 'tinkle, tinkle??)  i don't expect to ever get a complete answer, but i would like to know of any similar cases. the only one close i know of was in england, famously videoed, but nothing involving collision.
please get back to me if you have any light to shed.
content.summary: Glowing, bouncing, orb. (collision with).

content.detailedDescription:
my name is (*name deleted--sgonzalez/cms) living in madeira island which is located about 500 miles west of morocco.
on may 22 nd 2008 at about 21.57 pm local time my wife and i witnessed a strange light which at first i thought was an extremely bright star.I had just walked out onto our balcony, i then realized  that it was moving in relation to the stars in the sky .I then thought it must be a shooting star and expected it crash in to the atmosphere ,which did not occur. by this time my wife got the camera and managed to take two pictures before it disappeared from view over the apartment, heading northeast almost directly above us. the sighting lasted about 3 minutes. unfortunately we are not great photographers, the images are not great but left us  quite surprised and confused at what they revealed .In them  both appears a star and the object, they were taken a few seconds apart.
content.summary: Bright star like object  flying overhead.

content.detailedDescription: me an my friend were traveling on rt1-9 next to the giant stadium in nj close to new york city. we were on our way to a night club it was around 9:00pm we were listening to the radio an laughing. as i looked up at a tall hotel i saw bright lights an from behind it a disk liked ufo shot up in the sky an just stopped an it did it again then circled around the hotel it did have lights i remember they were red green white.I do not remember if it was spinning it was fast very fast. that is what i was afraid of i have never in my life saw any thing that fast an could just stop out of no where like that. my friend noticed it when i said omg! look we were in total shock an very scared we actually pulled over on the busy highway so we did not crash. we couldn't take our eyes off it. when it went behind the building i looked ahead of us an mabey 6 to 7 other cars also pulled over to see this. we waited to see it come from behind the hotel but after that it was gone!It was in front of us for mabey 4 to 5 min. mabey the second i looked at the cars in front of us it took off? not sure. after that me an my friend started going back onto the highway we were scared did not know who to tell cause we were not from the area. an after the 911 in ny an us so close to it we thought mabey it was a goverment aircraft an did not want to get involved we actually turned around an did not go to the night club we were all dressed up an everything. we drove back home still in shock an told our family i went on the computer to see if any one had wrote anything or reported it but had no luck! i am sure that a couple people saw this that was driving that night on the highway or even staying in that hotel!
content.summary: I saw a ufo by the giant stadium in nj circling a hotel.
